content: behind the original petals round 6 ch1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in ea chain space 6 petals round 7 ch3 bring chain behind petal *single_crochet in same st as single_crochet directly below on round 3 ch5* 6 times slip_stitch in beg single_crochet to join 6 chain space behind first two sections of petals round 8 ch1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in ea chain space total of 18 petals in all rounds bobble 2007 all rights reserved charissa clark howe pattern rev 10/01/07 http //www howe2knit blogspot com tulip round 1 ch2 6sc in second chain from hook slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 6 st round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same st as chain single_crochet in nxt st *2sc in nxt st single_crochet in ea of nxt 2 st* repeat between * 2 times slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join 8 st round 3 ch1 single_crochet in same st as chain *2sc in nxt st single_crochet in nxt st* repeat between * 3 times 2sc in last st 12 st round 4 ch1 single_crochet in same st as chain *2sc in nxt st single_crochet in ea of nxt 2 st* repeat between * 3 times 2sc in nxt st single_crochet slip_stitch in beg single_crochet to join 18 st round 5 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 17dc slip_stitch in top chain of beg ch3 to join 18 st round 6 ch1 *single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet* 6 times slip_stitch in beg single_crochet to join 18 st round 7 chain 1 *single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in nxt double_crochet single_crochet* repeat between * 6 times slip_stitch in beg single_crochet to join bobble finishing note this flower requires shaping starch if needed
